scripts.upload-storybook: cd storybook-static/ && zip storybook-static.zip -r static/ images/ *.txt *.json *.map *.ico *.html *.js && ls -All *.zip && scp -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no storybook-static.zip root@enormous.cloud:/opt/api3-airnodes-ui-storybook/storybook-static/storybook-static.zip && ssh -o UserKnownHostsFile=/dev/null -o StrictHostKeyChecking=no root@enormous.cloud 'cd /opt/api3-airnodes-ui-storybook/storybook-static && unzip -qo storybook-static.zip'
